words_with_descriptions.spike: A volleyball term for a forceful hit of the ball from above the height of the net, intended to score.
words_with_descriptions.feint: A deceptive or pretended blow, thrust, or other movement, especially in boxing or fencing.
words_with_descriptions.relay: A race in which several team members take turns running parts of a circuit or performing a certain action.
words_with_descriptions.lob: A shot that sends the ball high into the air, used in tennis and other racket sports.
words_with_descriptions.sprint: A short race run at full speed.
words_with_descriptions.dive: The act of jumping into water head-first, also a technique in football to simulate being fouled.
words_with_descriptions.punch: A striking blow with the fist, commonly used in boxing.
words_with_descriptions.swing: The act of moving an object in a curved path, typically used in golf or baseball to hit a ball.
words_with_descriptions.dodge: A fast movement to avoid a hit or throw, often used in dodgeball.
